update_every.title: Update every
update_every.description: Data collection interval, measured in seconds.

vnode.title: Virtual Node
vnode.description: Associates this data collection job with a [Virtual Node](https://learn.netdata.cloud/docs/netdata-agent/configuration/organize-systems-metrics-and-alerts#virtual-nodes).

functions.title: Functions
functions.description: Configuration for Netdata functions exposed by this collector.

top_queries.title: Top Queries
top_queries.description: Configuration for the top-queries function using SQL Server Query Store.

timeout.title: Timeout
timeout.description: Query timeout in seconds. Uses collector timeout if not set.

limit.title: Limit
limit.description: Maximum number of queries to return in the response.

time_window_days.title: Time Window (Days)
time_window_days.description: How many days of Query Store data to query. Set to 0 to query all available data (not recommended for busy servers).

timeout.title: Timeout
timeout.description: Query timeout in seconds. Uses collector timeout if not set.

use_ring_buffer.title: Use Ring Buffer
use_ring_buffer.description: Use ring_buffer target instead of event_file for system_health session. Enable for Azure SQL Database without blob storage.

timeout.title: Timeout
timeout.description: Query timeout in seconds. Uses collector timeout if not set.

session_name.title: Session Name
session_name.description: Name of the Extended Events session that captures error_reported events.

use_ring_buffer.title: Use Ring Buffer
use_ring_buffer.description: Use ring_buffer target instead of event_file. Enable for Azure SQL Database without blob storage.

vnode.ui:help: Optional: Group metrics under a virtual node for multi-instance setups.

timeout.ui:help: Accepts decimals for sub-second granularity (e.g., 0.5 for 500ms).

disabled.ui:help: WARNING: Query Store may contain unmasked PII (customer names, emails, IDs) in query text.

time_window_days.ui:help: Limits Query Store data to recent days. Lower values improve performance on busy servers.

disabled.ui:help: WARNING: Query text may contain unmasked sensitive literals. Requires VIEW SERVER STATE permission.

use_ring_buffer.ui:help: Enable for Azure SQL Database or environments without event_file access. Ring buffer can be slower.

disabled.ui:help: WARNING: Error messages and query text may contain unmasked sensitive literals. Requires VIEW SERVER STATE permission.

session_name.ui:help: The Extended Events session must be created by an administrator and include an event_file target capturing sqlserver.error_reported with sql_text action.
